author: Inside Edition
description: Police arrested a teacher at her home for predatory criminal sexual assault for having sex with her 11-year-old student. Alley Bardfield, a 34-year-old mother of three, was led away to jail. Bardfield just pled guilty in an Illinois court room. The judge sentenced her to 10 years in prison. Another teacher also pled guilty to sexual misconduct with a fifth grader. Madison Bergman, 25, was wedding planning when she was arrested, but cops say she became obsessed with the boy at her school.
title: Illinois Teacher Pleads Guilty To Predatory Criminal Sexual Assault

author: Inside Edition
description: Singer and actor Tyrese Gibson is the subject of a police warrant for his arrest after police say his pack of dogs mauled a puppy to death in an Atlanta neighborhood. Gibson's neighbor, Harrison Parker, tells Inside Edition his dog Henry was slaughtered when Gibson's unleashed guard dogs went on the attack. On Instagram, Gibson wrote, " I am praying for your healing and for your beloved pet, who never deserved this." His lawyer says he is cooperating with authorities to resolve the matter.
title: Tyrese Gibson's Dogs Fatally Maul Neighbor's Puppy

author: Inside Edition
description: Television hosts Jimmy Kimmel and Stephen Colbert made late night history appearing on each other's shows. The interviews aired simultaneously on ABC and CBS. The switcheroo was made possible because Jimmy Kimmel, who usually tapes his show in Los Angeles, is recording in Brooklyn this week, so the hosts were a 30-minute car-ride from each other. Kimmel revealed new details of how he found out his show had been suspended following comments he made about Charlie Kirk's assassination.
title: Jimmy Kimmel And Stephen Colbert On Each Other's Shows At Same Time

author: Inside Edition
description: Video newly released from last year shows singer Morgan Wallen exiting a Nashville bar after throwing a chair from the rooftop. The country star appeared cooperative, but oblivious as police questioned him over the incident. Moments later, police placed Wallen in handcuffs and ushered him to the back of a patrol car as he proclaimed his innocence. The 32-year-old later copped to two misdemeanor pleas of reckless endangerment.
title: Newly Released Bodycam Shows Morgan Wallen’s Encounter With Police

author: Inside Edition
description: An instant noodle challenge has been inspired by the most watched Netflix movie of all time: KPop Demon Hunters, and doctors are issuing a warning about the rise in burn injuries. In the popular animated film, a singing girl group battles evil, and they fuel up by slurping down ramen. Now social media users are slurping down ramen just like the movie characters, however, if you're not careful, you could get burned. Doctors are warning they are seeing an increase in burn injuries among children.
title: Doctors Issue Warning About Burn Injury Rise After Ramen Challenge

author: Inside Edition
description: Two young kids jumped into action when 35-year-old Sarah James passed out at home in Gillette, Wyoming.
title: Kids Save Mom's Life After Allergic Reaction #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: It was a scary commute for this truck driver and anyone who happened to be in his path. Reports say the truck veered off course as it was crossing an overpass and ended up partially hanging over the bridge. It happened in Turkey's Izmir province. The truck driver is said to have been rescued by firefighters and taken to the hospital with minor injuries. Inside Edition Digital’s Mara Montalbano has more.
title: Truck Hangs Off Overpass After Losing Control On Road

author: Inside Edition
description: Robert Springsteen was wrongly convicted and sentenced to death for the slaying of four teens in the #YogurtShopMurders in Austin, #Texas, in 1991. His conviction was overturned in 2006.
title: Man Freed After Death Sentence In Yogurt Shop Murders Speaks Out #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: Misty Combs from Kentucky stepped in to help a family of raccoons in distress. She noticed the mother raccoon was trying to get her babies out of a trash can. As she went to help, Misty saw that one was passed out from eating too many fermented peaches thrown out by a moonshine distillery. So, she gave the raccoon CPR. "I was just doing what my instinct said to do," she told Inside Edition Digital's Andrea Swindall.
title: Kentucky Nurse Gives CPR To Raccoon Drunk Off Moonshine

author: Inside Edition
description: Prosecutors say former Marine Sergeant Nigel Max Edge opened fire on diners at a popular restaurant in North Carolina Saturday night, killing three and wounding eight.
title: Marine Vet Shooting Suspect Accompanied Kellie Pickler To CMT Awards #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: The Pokemon card craze continues to reach new heights with card thieves now targeting small hobby shops in a string of robberies across the country. Over the summer, authorities say more than $175,000 worth of cards were stolen from hobby shops in Baltimore, Detroit, and Massachusetts. Card shop owner Felipe Andre says that the low supply of rare, expensive Pokemon cards has led to spikes in prices across the game, even for newer cards, which can attract card bandits looking to resell them to turn a big profit.
title: Pokemon Pandemonium: Cops Say Card Craze Has Thieves Striking Stores

author: Inside Edition
description: A group of high school students was pulling a prank for homecoming on his teacher. One student, with a roll of toilet paper, walked around the teacher's home when he suddenly heard the teacher's voice. Teacher Nate Viland and wife Marci got a kick out of watching the prank on their Ring cam. They spoke with Inside Edition. "I did remind them," Nate says, "I have the entire school year to exact my revenge little by little and their eyes went 'uh oh.'"
title: Teens Caught On Ring Cam Pulling Prank On Teacher

author: Inside Edition
description: During the meeting, #PresidentTrump appeared taken aback when he walked into a silent meeting room, in which generals sat with their hands on their laps as Trump spoke.
title: Trump And Hegseth's Military Gathering Criticized As 'Pointless'

author: Inside Edition
description: Ice and Kali are adorable and chill...but they're also hard-working dogs who accompany young witnesses and crime victims in the Maine legal system.
title: These Very Good Dogs Help Young Crime Victims #shorts
